Uses of Leaf in vista.graph
 

Classes in vista.graph that implement Leaf
 class Axis
          Axis contains a TickLine for ticks, TickText for tick labels, TextLine for axis labels.
 class CircleSymbol
          A circle symbol
 class Curve
          A superclass of all curves.
 class CurveLegendLine
          A line which represents the curve characterstics.
 class CurveLegendLine2D
          A line which represents the curve characterstics.
 class DefaultCurve
          Draws a default curve.
 class FlaggedCurve
          Draws a default curve.
 class FlaggedCurve2D
          Draws a default curve.
 class GEContainer
          This the base class for all graphic element container classes.
 class Graph
          This class manages the plot, its title and its legend.
 class GraphicElement
          This the base class for all graphic components.
 class Grid
          This controls the drawing of a line within the bounds of the given rectangle.
 class Legend
          This is an aggregate of LegendItem(s).
 class LegendItem
          A legend item for each Curve on the Plot consisting of a LineElement and associated TextLine.
 class LineElement
          This controls the drawing of a line within the bounds of the given rectangle.
 class MultiPlot
          A class containing a set of Plot objects.
 class PieChart
           
 class Plot
          A plot is defined as an area with atmost four axes aligned so as to make up a rectangle.
 class ReferenceCurve
          A curve which can toggle between displaying and not displaying flags
 class Symbol
          Symbol is a polygon shape drawn with respect to the x and y coordinates of rectangle.
 class TextLine
          Draws a line of text within given bounds.
 class TickLine
          This implements a line with major ticks and minor ticks.
 class TickText
          A class handling TextLine objects which share common data values.

          returns a copy of the array of graphic elements contained in this composite.

          returns a copy of the array of graphic elements contained in this composite.
 Leaf[] GEContainer.getElements(java.lang.Class elementClass)
          gets an array of graphic elements of the given element class type.
 Leaf DrawIterator.getNext()
          This gets the next set of values from the data set.
 Leaf CompositeIterator.getNext()
          This gets the next Leaf object and advances by one.
